Ayssi comensan las paraulas de Albucasim .	Aysa learns words from Albuquerque.
O, filhs, pus yeu he a vos complit aquest libre, le qual es le derier de la sciencia de medicina, per le compliment de lu so consequit la fi en lu, e per las exposicios de lu, e per las declaracios de lu, es a mi vist que yeu complesca aquel a vos am aquest tractat, le qual es partida de la operacio am ma, so es cyrurgia.	O children, as you have completed this book, which is the last of the medical science series, in honor of your achievement and for the insights provided within it, I believe that we should present to you this treatise, which is a part of my work on surgery.
Quar la operacio am ma es prostrada en nostre regio e en nostre temps de tot privada, entro que fort leu peric la sciencia de lu, e le vistigi de lu es ostat; e no romasero de lu sino alcunas petitas descripcios en les libres dels Antics, les quals mudero las mas e endevenc ad aquels error e heyssitacio entro que son clausas las entencios de lu e es elonguada la forsa de lu e l’art.	The work of which you speak was once completely erased from our realm and time, being totally deprived of it; only a few small descriptions remain in the ancient books, which have since become distorted by errors and heresies, to such an extent that its essence has been obscured and its art forgotten.
E es vist a mi que yeu vivifique aquela am ordenacio de aquest tractat en aquela segon la via de exposicio e de declaracio e de abreviacio; e per que vengua am las formas dels ferramentz de cautheri e dels autres instrumentz de la obra cum sia per addicio de la declaracio, e per preparacio de lu, la qual causa es necessaria.	I understand that you wish to revive this treatise in the way of exposition and declaration and abbreviation; so it comes to using tools for engraving and other instruments of work as required by the explanation, with necessary preparation being essential.
Mays la causa per la qual no es atrobat bo artifex am la sieua ma en aquest nostre temps, es quar la art de medicina es longua, e que cove le sieu actor denant aquo esser excercitat en la sciencia de anotomia la qual recontec Gualia entro que sapia les juvament dels membres e las formas de aquels, e la conjunctio e la separacio de lor; e haia la conoyssensa dels osses, dels nervis e dels lacertz, e·l nombre de aquels, e la egrecio de lor; e de las venas pulsatils e de las quietas, e dels locs del eyssiment de lor.	In the cause for which art is not atrophyed by a craftsman in this our time, it'n because the art of medicine is long and its practitioner must be exercised in the science of anatomy, as Guaia stated that he knew the movements of members and their forms; connections and separations among them; knowledge of bones, nerves, and ligaments, names of those parts, and strength of each; veins pulsing and at rest, and places where blood flows.
E per aquo ditz Ypocras que am u nom es mot, mays en l’obra petit, e majorment en la art de la ma.	The phrase "E per aigua dix Ypocras que amb el seu nom estem motos, mais en l'obra petit, i majorment en l'art de la mà" in Catalan translates to "And for water said Hippocrates that with his name we are alive, but mainly in the work small, and mostly in the art of the hand" in English.
Mays nos ja avem dit de aquel en l’introit de aquest libre; quar qui no es scient aquo que li avem dit de anotomia, no es evacuat que no caia en error per la qual siran mortz les homes, ayssi cum yeu he vist trops de aquels, quar alscus son formatz en esta sciencia e gettan se de aquela ses sciencia e ses experiment.	In the introduction to this book, we have said that if one does not know what has been told about anatomy herein, they will fall into error which may cause many people's death; as I have seen too often, for such are formed in this science and take themselves to be of it through their experiments.
Quar yeu vi un metge folh e enperit aver incidit un apostema escrophilos en le colh de una femna, e incidic alcunas arterias del colh per que fluic gran sanc entro que la femna cazec morta entre las mas de lu.	I once saw a physician who had contracted an abscess of the scrotum and caused some arteries in the neck to bleed, which led to a large amount of blood flowing into the woman'ebay chest, causing her to die among many others.
E vi un autre metge que pres que el traguera una peyra d’un home le qual avia procesit en sa etat, e la peyra era gran, e venguet a lu e trayssec aquela peyra am un tros de la vesiqua, per que aquel home al tertz dia es mort.	A certain merchant who was more virtuous than the traitor took a stone from a man he had accused in his state; and the stone was large, and he threw it to the left of the road, so that this man died on the third day.
E yeu ja apelat fuy a estrayre aquela, e vi que per la grandesa de la peyra e per la disposicio del malaute conogui subre lu que morira.	The stone that lies outside has such enormous size and due to the illness I know it will die.
E vi un autre metge le qual prenia stipendic de un duc de nostra terra per cyrurgia, e endeven a un crastrat negre le qual era deves lu fractura en la coyssa de lu; e perparec le metge am la sua ignorancia, estrayssec la fractura, sobre la plagua, am pulvinas e astelas am forta strectura, e no layssec a la plagua espiracio.	A physician from our land received a salary of a duke for surgery and treated an old black man who had a fracture in his leg; the doctor made use of his ignorance, extracting the fracture on top of the pillow, with cushions and splints using strong pressure, without healing the wound.
E aprop le desliet segons los sieus desiriers, e aprop le relieg, e aprop le leyssec per alcus jorns e comandec que nos deslies le liament; e estec ayssi entro que la coyssa e·l pe foro apostematz, e pervenguet a perdicio.	Above all things be faithful to your desires, and loyalty as well, and take care during the uncertain times of life; I command you not to flee from the challenge but to embrace it so that even if adversity strikeback with full force, we shall overcome.
E yeu fuy apelat a lu, e aparelhegui a desliar le liament, e conseguida es tranquilitat e enayssi amermet de sas dolors.	Once upon a time, there was a young woman who felt the need to escape from her life and find inner peace and relief from her troubles. She decided to embark on a journey of self-discovery that would eventually help her overcome these challenges.
Mays empero ja corrupcio era confermada en le membre, per que no pogui refrenar aquela, e no cessec perambular la corrupcio en le membre entro que·l malaute peric.	However, the infection was already confirmed within the member, so it could not prevent that and did not cease to wander the infection within which the illness posed a threat.
E vi un autre metge le qual perforec un apostema cancros, e fo ulcerat aprop alscus dias, entro que foc magnificada la malicia de lu am lo senhor de lu.	A certain physician successfully treated an abscess with cancerous growths, which became ulcerated after several days; during this time the malevolence of his lord increased greatly.
La qual causa es quar le cranc caut es pur de humor melencolic, lahoras no cove que pervengua a lu am ferr de tot, sino que sia an membre le qual suffertes que de tot fos hostat.	The main cause of your melancholcuar mood is that you don't feel like reaching out to anyone and instead become a member who suffers from feeling isolated from everything.
E per aquo, filhs, necessari es a vos que la operacio am ma sia devisada en dos devesios: so es en operacio a lu qual es associada salut, e en obra am la qual es perilh en las majors disposicios.	The operation must be carried out in two steps: the first step is associated with safety and the second step involves taking measures to avoid major risks.
E yeu ja he exsitat aquo en tot loc de aquest libre en le qual venc opperacio en la qual es error e temor; per que necessari es a vos que guardetz aquo e layssetz aquel, per que les folhs no atrobo via a parlar e a vos desonestar.	In this text from the Old Occitan language (also known as Provençal), written by the poet Peire Vidal around the year 1200, we find a plea for freedom of expression and against censorship:
E donc prenetz las vostras armas am sollicitut e am proteccio de Dieu , e les vostres malautes am falicitat e am fermetat.	Come, take your weapons into the sun and God's protection, and may your sick recover and be healed.
E usatz de la milhor via per la gracia de Dieu perdusent a salut e a lausabla successio, e laysatz las malautias terriblas de difficil sanacio, e ostatz las vostras armas de aquo que vos fa temer, per so que ysitatio en vostra fe e en le vostre nom no vos evasisca: quar mays es remanent a la vostra gloria, e pus aut en le mon e en derier a las vostras sanctitatz.	The most effective prayers for God's grace lead to salvation and praiseward successions, eradicate the most terrible of illnesses with difficult healing, remove your fears caused by water through which you wade, so that contemplation in your faith and in your name shall not abandon you. For it remains for your glory, as well as in heaven or at last to your holy sanctity.
Gualia ja diyssec en alcunas sieuas monicios:	Guillermo deseja discutir sobre algunas de sus motivaciones personales.
“No mediquetz malautia mala, per so que mals metges no siatz nompnatz”.	"There's no medication for this illness, but don't worry as you are not alone."
E yeu ja he devesit aquest libre segontz tres capitols.	Chapter One - The Mysterious Island'n Adventure
Comensa la divisio del libre, e primier de la primieyra partida.	Begin the division of the free and first of the first partition.
Le primier capitol ordenat del cap entro·s pes, en las formas dels instrumentz e en les ferrementz dels cauteris, e de aquo que necessari es en la opperacio.	First capital ordered of the head entry-related tools, in the forms of instruments and equipment for cauterization, as well as that which is necessary for surgery.
La divisio de la segonda partida.	Division of the second half.
Le segon capitol, de siccio e perforacio, e de ventosas, e de plaguas, e de extractio de sagetas e de semblantz ad aquelas, tot capitolat e ordenat de las formas dels instrumentz.	The second chapter concerns lancets and cauterization, as well as cupping and leeching, and the extraction of splinters and bandages for those purposes; it completely covers and systematically organizes the methods and techniques regarding these instruments.
Divisio de la tersa partida.	Third Partition Division.
Le tertz capitol, de restauracio e de dislocacio, e de curacio de torcio e de semblantz ad aquels; capitol ordenat del cap entro·s pes, e de las formas dels instrumentz. De cauteri am foc e am medicina aguda e rememoracio de la opperacio.	The burn on the wrist caused by acute medical conditions and memory of the opera performance.
Am aquel comensa le tractat de tot le libre.	In the beginning of the treatise, all knowledge is considered free.
Cove que yeu digua la qualitat dels juvamentz de aquel cauteri e dels noccumentz de lu, e en qual compleccio sia prohibit cauteri.	I tell you about the quality of that jewelry and its settings, as well as why such items are forbidden to wear a crucifix.
Donc dic que·l sermo de la qualitat del juvament de cauteri e del noccument de lu es sermo lonc e prolixs, e subtil per sciensa, e secret amaguat; e ja de lu a parlat gran multitut de savis, e de lu se son desacordatz, et a mi abasta un petit dels sermons de lor, temen perlonguacio.	I say that the language of quality in youth and the science of cauterization and incision is an extensive, prolific, and subtle one; it has been shrouded in secrecy by knowledge, and many wise men have spoken much about it but still disagree with each cuase. For me, a small part of their sermons suffices, as they fear long-winded explanations.
E donc dic que cauteri comfereys a tota compleccio universalment la qual es am materia o ses materia, exceptat dos compleccios, las quals son compleccios caudas ses materia .	Therefore, I would say that causality affects universally all matter or its characteristics, with the exception of two types of matters - properties related to their composition.
En la compleccio cauda e secca am materia se desecordero; quar alcus dyssero que cauteri es juvatiu ad aquela, e les autres dyssero le contrari de aquel, que cauteri no es convenient en malautia la qual es per qualiditat e per siccitat, quar natura del foc es qualiditat e siccitat, e enconvenient es que malautia cauda e secca am aquo que es caut e sec sia sanada.	In the case of scalp psoriasis and dry skin, the affected matter may detach; some physicians advise using a shampoo for that condition, while others argue against it, as this type of medication is not suitable for illnesses characterized by qualities such as dryness, since the nature of heat (found in most treatments) also has these qualities and may hinder healing when water-based hydration is needed.
E diysec aquel que ditz le contrari de aquel, que per cauteri es fayt juvament en tota malautia cauda e secca que ve en les cors dels homes, quar quan tu comparas le cors de home e las humiditatz de lu a la compleccio del foc, atrobas le cors de home freg.	Here is the translation of that text from Occitan to English:
E yeu dic per le sermo de aquel, que esperiment aquo ja a mi alscunas vetz a descubert.	Indeed, I have heard about it and experienced that too some extent myself. Let's talk more on this subject.
Mays empero no cove que vengua sobre aquo aquel que ja es exproat e excersitat en le capitol de cauteri per derier exercici, e a conogut la diversitat de la compleccio dels homes e la disposicio de las malautias en lor meteyssas, e las causas de aquelas, e·ls accidentz de lor, e l’espasi del temps de aquelas.	However, it does not come to pass that he is present over there who has been excommunicated and exercised in the capitol of Caution for the third time, and knows the diversity of human difficulties and their conditions of illnesses, along with the causes of those ailments and the extent of them.
Mays en las autras compleccios, no es sobre vos temor, e majorment en las malautias fregas e humidas, quar ja totz les metges se son acordatz sobre aquels, e no so desecordatz en le juvament am cauteri en aquelas.	In other ways too, it's not about your fear; mostly in the leaky and damp diseases, for all of them agree on this, and they don't hesitate to act during those times with cautionary measures.
E sapiatz, filhs, que del secret de curacio per cauteri am foc e de la bontat de lu, so sobre cauteri am medicina comburent, es quar le foc es simple, la accio del qual no perven sino al membre le qual es cauterizat e no notz al autre membre am lu ajustat sino am petit nocument.	Listen well, children, for I shall now reveal the secret of curative fire and its healing effects as well as the virtue that accompanies it; indeed, simple heat is involved here, whose action reaches only to the member being cauterized, causing no harm whatsoveeher unto other members nearby.
Mays la accio de medicina comburent perven ad aquel en les membres le qual de lu alunhat, e fort leu fa venir en le membre malautia de dificil sanacio e fort leu ausit.	The medical salve brought relief to the affected limb which was previously numb, and it greatly helped in accelerating healing and easing the painful ailment for an easy recovery.
Mays le foc, per la sua sublimitat e de la sua substancia bontat, no fa aquo sino que superfluisca E ja es a nos conogut per experiment e per longitut de servitut de studi am l’art sobre le veritat de las causas; e per aquo yeu so excusat de la longitut del sermo E si no fos que no es legut al mieu libre en aquest pausero a vos secret amaguat am le foc, e la qualitat de la operacio de lu en les cors e de la sieua expulcio per la qual expellis las malautias, am sermo philosophic demostratiu, le qual siria acuit en las vostras pessas.	Mays the fire, for its sublimity and of its substance goodness, does not do anything except to overflow abundantly; and it is known to us by experiment and by the lengthy service of study in the art over the truth of causes; and so I am excused from the length of the speech. If it weren't for that, it would be unjust to my free time on this idle moment with you secretly hinted at fire, and the quality of its operation upon the bodies and through the entire expulsion by which diseases are expelled; as a philosophical demonstration in words, which would become clear in your sufferings.
E sapiatz, filhs, que els se desacordan del temps en le qual es convenient far cauteri e pausan le milhor temps de primaveyra.	Children, let us not dispute the best time of spring to make a bonfire and take a break.
E yeu dic que cauteri es convenient en tot temps, per so que le nocument per le temps accident es submergit en le juvament de aquo que am le cauteri es atirat, e majorment si le cauteri es per dolors o de dolors necessaries, fortz e fistinas, las quals no suffertan tarditat per so que es temut de aquelas que vengua malicia, que es major que petit nocument entrant per lo temps.	Indeed, I declare that cauterization is beneficial at all times, for the harm caused by accidental events gets absorbed in the rush of water that runs from the wound after it's cauterized, especially if the cauterization is due to severe or constant pains, which do not suffer lateness so much because there is a fear of those consequences, greater than slight harm occurring during this time.
E aysso no catz en vostras pessas, o, filhs, aquo no estiman sino le poble vulguar e les fols metges, so es que ad aquela malautia que es sanada per cauteri no es redicio tot temps, e pausan aquel consequen.	In the country of our ancestors, or children, this disease is only known to common people and mad cooks; that's because the illness which is treated with cauterization does not always heal completely, and sometimes it returns.
E la causa no es ges ayssi quo els cuydan per aquo, quar cauteri no es sino en loc de medicina la qual altera la compleccio e esicca las humiditatz las quals son causa per que veno las dolors.	The cause is not as some believe in such situations, because cupping therapy is not a substitute for medicine which alters the complexion and dries out the moisture which are causes why pain occurs.
Mays empero cauteri superflueys sobre la medicina per volicitat de la sua valitut e vertut de la sua operacio e grandesa del sieu senhor.	Nevertheless, he used excessive caution in his medical treatments due to the pride of his profession and zeal for his work as well as the greatness of his master.
E es possible que la sua malautia retorne en alcuna hora del temps, segon la compleccio del malaute e la locacio de la sua malautia, e la vertut de lu, e aquo que es preparat en le cors de lu de la agreguacio de las superfluitatz en lu, e aquo que es pervengut a lu en la sua acquisicio en viandas e semblantz de aquelas causas; sino que la malautia en la qual sia aministrat cauteri sia malautia subtil en membre de paucas superfluitatz e humiditatz, ayssi cum cauteri de dent per dolor e semblantz ad aquel, possible es que en lu no retorne aquela dolor, mays aquo se fa en petitz.	It is not always certain that the disease will return at any time in the future, according to the complexity of the illness and its location on his body, as well as how well he has prepared through the addition of excess fluids to his diet, and what has been ingested into him through foods and appearances related to those causes; rather, the disease for which a cauterization was administered is a subtle illness in few members with some fluidity and humidity, just as it would be with a toothache, so that in him, this pain does not return but what he has done as prevention.
E mays sermo vulgar es que cauteri es le derier remezi de medicina, e es sermo dreyturier, no ad aquo que els entendo en lu, quar els crezo que no es curacio que aprofieyta am medicina ni am autra causa aprop cauteri.	The common folk believe that cauterization is the last resort in medicine and it's deemed effective; however, I don't quite understand to what extent they hold this belief, but I think it doesn't provide any real benefit as a medical treatment or for any other purpose.
E la causa es en contrari de aquo; e la entencio que cauteri es le derier remezi de medicina no es sino quan administram las manieyras de curacio en alcunas malautias, e aquelas medicinas no conferieysso, e aprop en la fi de la causa aministra hom cauteri, e aprofieyta ad aquela.	The reason for this is contrary to the above; and I believe that caulking is only the last resort of medicine, not as it administers treatment methods in certain illnesses, and those medicines do not cure them, so at the end of the disease one should use caulking, and apply it there.
E lahoras de aqui cat16 que cauteri es le derier remezi de medicina, no segon la entencio la qual entendo les vulgars e trops dels fols metges.	"Today's medical practices are far removed from the rudimentary techniques of the past; contrary to what some may believe based on common misconceptions and exaggerated tales."
E diyssero les antics que cauteri am aur es milhor que cauteri am ferr, e no diyssero aquo sino per la equalitat del aur e sublimitat de la sua sustancia.	They argued that gold jewelry is better than iron jewelebecause and didn't mention water even for the equality of gold and the greatness of its substance.
E diyssero que le loc de cauteri no fa brac, cum aquo no sia absolutament vertat, quar yeu ja he aquo proat e he atrobat que aquel no fa aquo sino en alcus cors ses les autres, e cauteri am aquel es bo e milhor que am ferr ayssi quo els diyssero; mays empero quan tu fas cauteri am foc am de aur, no es a tu declarat, quar es egnit segon la quantitat que tu vols per la rugor de l’aur, e quar prepara a recebre freg; e si ajustas sobre lu ignicio se fon l’aur per le foc, e caso en le foc alcunas laminas per que le artifex catz per la occupacio de aquel.	They said that the place of burning does not work without water being completely submerged; because I have already tasted and tried it myself, and found out that this doesn't make water but only boils other substances, while cauterization with gold is better than iron in all aspects as they mentioned. However, when you use fire made of gold, you did not tell me how much to prepare for the malleability of gold, and also it needs to be able to endure heat; if you place it over a flame, the gold will turn into ash because of the fire, and sometimes there are thin layers that an artisan can work with.
E per aquo es fayt cauteri am ferr deves nos pus leugerament e pus propdanament a rectitut de operacio.	L'argon, by far the most abundant gas in our atmosphere, is used minimally and primarily during surgical operations to promote tissue healing.
E yeu ja he ordenat aquest capitol en le cauteri segon capitols, et he ordenat aquels del cap entro les pes, per so que aleugo le demandant aquo que vol de lu.	The Lord has decreed this chapter to be read in the churches following other chapasters, and He ordered those of higher rank within the peasants' society that they may grant whatever is requested by Him.
De cauteri de dolor de cap per frigiditat e humiditat.	The procedure for treating scalp cold sores caused by cold and dampness.
Le capitol primier.	First capital
Aquesta cauterizacio confereys a la humiditat e frigiditat sobre le servel accident de la qual so doas causas, so es causa de soda e multitut de flux raumatic, apelat corissa, del cap a las partidas dels huelhs e de las aurelhas fluent, e multitut de dormir, e de dolor de dentz e del guolayro, e universalment de tota malautia que ve per fregiditat, ayssi cum paraliticament, sodo e apoplexio, e semblantz en aquelas malautias.	This incision provides moisture and coolness on the affected area due to which there are two main causes, one being salty fluid secretion from the head towards the ears and many tears flowing, also causing excessive sleepiness, toothache, and throat pain, universally of any illness that comes through coldness, such as paralysis, stroke, and similar conditions in those disecuases.
La forma de aquesta cauterizacio es aquesta, que primieyrament comandes al malaute que sia evacuat am medicina lacsativa le cap mondificant, per tres o per quatre nueytz, segon que exhigeys la vertut del malaute e la edat de lu e la sua costuma.	The shape of this cauterization is as follows, which initially commands the illness to be evacuated with medicinal laxatives making a change within three or four nights, depending on the nature of the ailment and the age of the patient and their habits.
E aprop comanda li que raza le sieu cap am razor, e aprop fay aquel sezer entre las tuas mas sobre una banca cayrada e que pause las suas mas sobre le pietz sieu.	A command his horse to lower its head towards the razor, and approached it so as to stand between your horses on a fallen log while resting them on their hoovebottoms.
E aprop pausa la razit de la tua palma aprop le pous sobre la razit del nas entre les huels sieus.	Please place your hand's flat surface on top of the tip of my nose between my eyes.
Mays empero, cum le tieu dit del mieg loc es pervengut, signa aquel loc am tenta, e aprop igneys le cauteri olivar del qual aquesta es la forma:	However, as you mentioned about the place arriving tomorrow, I'll visit that location and then light up its olive grove, which has this shape:
E aprop pausa aquel sobre le loc senhat am tenta, a manieyra que descent, am la qual la tieua ma sia constrengida petit a petit, e tu revolveys aquel.	In that pause over the spot you feel healthiest, the movement that descends within you, which gradually makes your spirit soar and then turns around.
E aprop leva la tua ma leugerament e reguarda le loc, e si veses ja del os esser descubert alcuna quantitat del cap, ayssi cum la quantitat de gra de errs, lahoras eleva la tua ma, e si no torno la tua ma am aquel ferr, am autre de aquel, si es enfrigidat, entro que sia vist del os aquo que yeu he dit a tu.	A) Approach your horse calmly and observe the location, checking if any part of its head is exposed, similarly to how much hay you would feed it. If so, raise your hand again, but do not turn around with that same arm; instead, use another arm or have someone else assist you. Ensure the area remains quiet as you perform these steps.
E aprop pren un petit de sal e disolveys aquel sobre le loc e leyssa aquel per tres jorns.	Take a small amount of salt and dissolve it in that water then let that sit for three days.
E aprop pausa sobre lu coto enbegut en boder e leyssa aquel sobre lu entro que sia destrusida la scara del foc.	Proceed to the given location and place that item on the surface within the marked border, ensuring it does not cover the central area.
E aprop cura le loc am anguent tetrafarmacon entro que sia sanat.	In English, the phrase translates to "Bring me some calming tea with four-pharmacy components that will ensure my health." However, this translation is still quite literal and may not convey a clear meaning in English as it does in Romanian. A more idiomatic way of saying this might be:
E ja diyssero que quant la plagua roman uberta, tant mielhs geta le brac, per que es milhor e mays juvatiu.	When the Roman Empire fell, it was better for people's health and well-beebut more so for their freedom, because they were no longer under such strict control and had a greater sense of autonomy.
E diyssero alcus de lor que sia cauterizada la codena entro al os, e sia tengut le cauteri entro que sia adhurida alcuna partida de la specitut del os.	They shall use cold iron blades to cut off the diseased bone within the skull, and place the caustic agents in such a way that they are adhered to any portion of the outer surface of the skull.
E aprop sia ras aquo que es adhust del os, e aprop sia curat.	A proper seal of the letter and envelope should match; both should be accurate.
E diyssero autres que am lo cauteri pervengua al derier, entro que enprema en le os forta enprecio entro que le os caga, e aquesta es la forma de alphecati petit:	Several other methods than the cauterization procedure can be used to achieve hemostasis (stopping bleeding), including applying pressure directly on the wound and elevating it above heart level. Here is a simple guideline for these methods, along with instructions for using an alphabetic code system:
E estiman de aquel loc expiran la vapors del cap.	It is believed that from that place the vapors of the head emanate.

Mays a mi no so vistas aquestas doas specias de cauteri de tot, sino en alcus homes segon via de temor; e layssa aquel, deves mi, milhor es am salut, quan es; quar le cap es develitat per solucio de continuitat de lu ayssi cum havem testificat en les autres membres, e majorment quan le cap del malaute es de freul natura. Capitol .xvi.	The capital of the United States is Washington D.C., which stands for the District of Columbia. It was founded after the American Revolution and officially became the nation'amo Capital in 1790 following the Residence Act passed by Congress, designating it as the permanent seat of government. Located between Virginia and Maryland, Washington D.C. is not part of any state and operates under a unique federal jurisdiction. It serves as the political center for the country, hosting iconic landmarks such as the White House, Capitol Hill, and numerous national monuments.

Capitol .xxii.	"Capital, Volume II" (German: "Das Kapital, Band II") is a continuation of Karl Marx's seminal work in political economy and critique of capitalism. This second volume focuses on the process of circulation within a capitalist mode of production, exploring how money capital functions as both an instrument for the realization of surplus value (profit) and a means by which that surplus is expanded through investment, leading to accumulation. Marx delves into the intricate relationships between commodities and their prices, the role of credit in facilitamoetns economic activity, and the inherent contradictions within capitalism's circulation process itself. As with "Capital," Volume I, this work is essential for understanding Marxist economics and the dynamics of modern economies predicated on a capitalist framework.
De cauterizacio de extrophulos.	Cauterization of the ectropion.
Quan extrophulos so de flecma e de humors fregas e no so hobedientz a digistio per medicinas e tu voys la digistio de aquelas leugerament, lahoras tu igneys le cauteri conquau la forma del qual es aquesta seguen, havent dos extremitatz hubertas per que yesca le fum deves le cauteri per l’autra extremitat, e pausa aquel ignit sobre aquel apostema una veguada, e autre si indigeyses de aquel, entro que pervengua al preon del apostema.	Extrophylos are a type of bandage and cooling salve used for treating wounds or inflammaturas with medicines. To apply it, heat the extremities so that they become slightly red-hot (ignite). De cauterizacio de pes e de las coyssas.	Electrocautery is a medical procedure in which an electric current is used to remove or destroy tissue during surgery, often by using a tool called an electrocautery pen or diathermy device. It's commonly employed to cauterize (burn) blood vessels and control bleeding (hemostasis), but it can also be utilized for cutting through tissues and removing unwanted growths such as warts, tumors, or polyps. The technique minimizes the risk of excessive bleeding during surgery while offering precision in targeting specific areas.

In case of an accident causing the loss of blood or severe bleeding on the surface of your body (especially in large wounds), you must urgently take action to stop the bleeding by using a tourniquet and clean water. You should gather some cloth, such as a handkerchief, a piece of fabric, or a bandana. Wrap it around the injured area tightly above the site of the injury. Use a stick or similar object tied with string to create a makeshift handle for twisting. Twist this handle until the bleeding stops by applying pressure on the wound and clotting begins. Remember that tourniquets should only be used as a last resort due to their potential risks if left in place for too long. Seek medical attention immediately.

Capitol .liiii.	The Senate of the Republic (Italian: Senato della Repubblica) is the upper house of Italy' cu parliamentary bicameral system, and meets in Palazzo Madama on Piazza del Campidoglio in Rome. Its membership is determined, following a form similar to that of the United States Senate, by elections held every five years, and it has 315 elected members. The senators are considered to be the more experienced senior lawmakers, as they are also ex officio lifetime members of the Council for Arbitration between the Italian National Collective Bargaining Parties (consultative organism whose goal is resolving labor disputes).
De cauterizacio de tremor.	Treatment for tremors can involve various methods, including medications, lifestyle changes, and in some cases, surgery such as deep brain stimulation (DBS). Cerebellar cauterization is not a standard treatment for tremors. If you're experiencuing tremors, it's important to consult with a healthcare professional who can provide an accurate diagnosis and discuss appropriate treatments based on the cause of your tremors.

Capitol .lv.	The Capitol is a term often associated with the building where a state or nation's legislative branch meets, such as the United States Capitol in Washington D.C., which houses both chamber of Congress - Senate and House of Representatives. In general usage, 'capitol' can refer to the seat of government for any state, region or country.

Capitol .iii.	The United States Capitol Building, commonly referred to as the Capitol, is an iconic symbol of American democracy and serves as the home of the U.S. Congress. Located in Washington D.C., it stands atop Capitol Hill on the east bank of the Potomamo River and represents the seat of legislative power for both the Senate and the House of Representatives.

Capitol .x.	Capital(s). In political science, a capital refers to the city or town that serves as the seat of government and administrative center for a country, state, province, etc. Some countries have more than one capital serving different purposes; for example, South Africa has three capitals – Pretoria (executive), Bloemfontein (judicial), and Cape Town (legislative).

Capitol .xi.	The word "Capitol" originates from the Latin term "caput," which means head or chief, and "-olus," a diminutive suffix. In ancient Rome, during public meetings, important discussions would take place in central locations known as "Capita." Over time, these gathering places evolved into political centers representing civic power. Eventpertly, the Capitol building was named to symbolize the principal seat of government and legislative authority within a city or country.

The tear ducts you've drawn consist of two main parts: the upper part, known as the Lacrimal Sac, and the lower part referred to as the Nasolacrimal Duct. Tears are produced by the lacrimal glands located above each eye. They flow across your eyes, cleaning and lubricating them before being collected in the tear sacs at the inner corners of your eyelids. From there, tears drain into the nasolacramal ducts which lead to the back of your nose or mouth. This is why when you cry a lot or even yawn, you might notice saltwater running down your throat - those are tears coming from the lacrimal sac through the nasolacrimal duct.

Capitol .xxvi.	Title: "Capitol xxvi" (English Translation)
De sutura del nas e de las labias e de la aurelha quan la continuitat es dissolvuda per plagua o per semblantz.	Nasal and lip clefts, as well as auricular (ear) clefts are congenital anomalies where the continuity is disrupted by either a gap or resembling two separate structures.

So autras apostemas les quals cove que sian traucatz quan son cruzes, e no son maturatz segon lor compliment, ayssi cum apostemas que son propdas a las juncturas, quar apostema quan ve prop junctura, lo esser de lu es prolonguat entro que·s poyreys aquo que es en le circuit de lu, e fort leu son corromputz les liamentz o les nervis de aquela junctura, per que es fayta causa de contraccio de aquel membre; o es apostema prop de membre principal, e si tu tardas la perforacio de lu entro sia madurat nosira al membre principal; o es prop le cul, donc perfora aque no-madurat; e no cove que·l perforas cru, de no-complida degestio, sino aquel que es prop del cul, per so que no poyresca le preon de lu e sia elonguat a las partidas dedintz del cul, e sia fayta fistula, o que sia fayt en le terme de lu que no sia sanat.	Therefore, various types of abscesses require different approaches when crossing them with surgical incisions during their maturation period according to the stage they are at; similarly to abscesses that drain near joints, if an incision is made too close to a joint, it may prolong within this area and could lead to contamination of the adjacent ligaments or nerves. If the abscess is located close to a major member, waiting for maturation before performing a perforation can prevent damage to that member; alternatively, if the abscess is near the rectum, perform an incision away from its completion point so as not to cause contamination and spread towards other parts of the rectum. This may also result in fistula formation or delayed healing.

Capitol .lx.	The United States Capitol, located in Washington D.cu Cittă de Stat ("Washington DC"), is the home of the United States Congress and the seat of the legislative branch of the U.S. government. Constructed between 1850-1863, it stands as a symbol of American democracy and hosts important political events in the country's history. The Capitol building has undergone several renovations over time to accommodate the growing needs of Congress and is an iconic landmark situated on Capitol Hill.

De seccio sobre ernia acoza.	A hernia occurs when an organ or fatty tissue squeezes through a weak spot in the surrounding muscle or connective tissue. The most common type of hernia is called an inguinal (inguinal) hernia, which develops in the lower abdomen and groin area.
Hernia ayguoza no es sino agregacio de humiditat en le ciphac blanc lo qual es dejos la codena dels genetius contenent le huou, e es nompnat ciphac.	Hernia aoüzo is simply the addition of moisture in white fiber which is left after removing the germs containing oil; it's not named "fiber".
E alcunas veguadas es en le propri pannicol le qual a lu preparec natura en la partida del huou, entro que sia cuyat que ja es autre huou; e es la codena del genetiu entre le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, e no es aquo sino tart.	In some cases, there are leaves on the plant's panniculus that have a natural tendency to detach at the parting of the hair, within which it is curly and has been mentioned as white-tipped; however, these are not oats but barley.
E la generacio de aquest hernia es per debelitat la qual accideys als genetius, per que ad aquels es efundunda aquesta materia, e alcunas vetz accideys per percuscio fayta sobre les genetius.	The generation of this hernia is due to weakness which occurs as a result of the congenital condition, so that in those it leads to the protrusion of this tissue and sometimes bulges occur due to impact made on the inguinal region.
E aquesta humiditat es havent motas colors, quar la color de lu o es declinant a citrina o a sanguinent, o rog, o es negra feculenta, o es ayguosa blanqua, e es aquo que es mays.	This humidity has various colors; sometimes it is yellowish or reddish-brown, grayish, watery and white, or the water that you see more often.
E les senhals per les quals es saubut on es aquesta agreguacio de aygua so aquestz: quar si es en le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, lahoras le apostema es redon declinant un pauc a longitut ayssi cum figura de huou, e appar le genetiu, quar la humiditat conte aquel de tota part.	The signs indicating that this addition of water is present in the white cloud we have mentioned earlier consist of hair-like streaks gradually decreasing in length, and its genesis, wherein the moisture content originates from all directions.

Capitol .lxv.	CAPITOL LXV (Capitol 65) refers to a specific volume or section within a series of publications, documents, or collections produced by the U.S. Congress's Legislative Resource Center, which is part of the Library of Congress. Therefore, Capitol LXV would be an item that holds information related to legislation or historical records pertaining to U.S. law and governance from a particular period or theme labeled as such in the series.

E aquesta es la manieyra de sutura comuna: una que prenguas la agula, o comte de agula segon la cantitat de la amplitut de la plagua; e aprop layssa de la extremitat de la disrupcio del dit anular, e strenh la agula una, otre que tu no metas fiel en las doas extremitatz de la codena, am doas extremitatz del ciphac que es dejos la codena de las partidas dedintz, entro que fassas aquela penetrar de aquela partida; e tu ja has agreguadas doas extremitatz de la codena e doas extremitatz del ciphac, e so faytas quatre ordes.	This is the common suturing technique: one where you take the needle and count stitches according to the width of the wound; then place the needle on the edge of the wound without causing further tearing, making sure not to insert it too deeply at the ends of the tendon or any tissue left after detachment. While doing this, you have already made two sets of stitches - one set being from each end of the tendon and another from the flap edges. You have now completed four orders.
E aprop strenh am fiel doble en le circuit de la agula, e alcunas veguadas de doas partz ensemps, e aprop agregua las doas labias e la plagua per agreguacio decent; e aprop layssa la grossitut del dit e fiqua una autra agulha en aquela, e aprop lia aquela am fiel ayssi cum fiest am la primieyra agulha; e no cesses far aquo si es necessitat am las agulhas entro que ajas complida tota la contriccio de la plagua.	In this process, the needle is strengthened with a double thread in the circuit of the awl, and some pieces of soft leather are added for reinforcement and the tip is sharpened again; then another needle is placed on it so that it resembles the first one. Continue doing this if necessary until you have completed all circuits with the needles required.
E sian las agulhas migieras entre groceza e subtilitat, quar las agulhas subtils mot leugierament insciden la carn; e las grossas so de dificil intrament en la codena, e donc per aquo cove que sian migieras en subtilitat e grosseza.	The fine needles migrate between grotesqueness and subtlecuity, for the fine ones slightly pierce the skin; and the thick ones are difficult to maneuver in the cord, hence they should be made to balance both subtlety and bulkiness.
E no cove que la agulha sia ficada en doas extremitatz de la codena propdana mot, per so que la carn no sia inscidida leugierament e que la plagua se huebra devant la sua consolidacio. E no sian prolonguadas de sutura per que la plagua no sia prohibida de consolidacio.	In cases where the fracture is not severely displaced, surgical intervention may be unnecessary for bone healing to occur.

A proper inspection of the needle's tips ensures that they do not cause any harm during use. Mays la segonda sutura es cominal: e es que tu aministres am sutura las quatre extremitatz, de la codena e doas extremitatz del ciphac, en una veguada, am agulha en la qual sia fiel envolopat engual en subtilitat e grosseza.	The second suture is comisural; it consists of managing the four extremities, both ends of the fibula and tibia bones in one session, using a needle which should be fine but also sturdy.

E pausa entre quascuna sutura la quantitat del gros del dit mendre.	There is a pause between each suture, making up most of the entire piece.
E aquesta sutura sabo les homes.	This stitching technique is for the shirts you requested, sirs.
E am tal sutura yeu cozegui la plagua la qual era accidida a un home en le sieu ventre le qual era stat plaguat am un cotel, e era la disrrumpcio de la plagua major de un palm, e era eyssit dels budels entorn dos palms del budel del mieg loc e era la disrupcio en le mieg del membre; e adonc yeu reduzegui aquel depus que le budel havia stat foro la plagua per xxiiii horas. Mays yeu diyre dos specias de sutura proprias segon narracio de Paraula.	According to the description by Paul, there are two specific types of suture materials.
E es que tu comenses am sutura de la codena, e entrometas agulha de la partida deforo a la partida dedintz.	You begin the stitching of the incision and insert the needle through to the other side of the wound.
E donc cum la agulha penetra en la codena e en aquel meteys lacertz segon rectetut e en longetut de tot le cos, e layssa la extremita del ciphac en le qual has entromesa la agulha; e fay penetrar en la autra extremitat la agulha de la partida dedintz a la partida deforo en l’autra extremitat del mihat. E don cum tu auras fayta aquela penetrar, lahoras tu fay aquela penetrar autra veguada en aquela meteyssa extremitat del mihat de la partida deforo a la partida dedintz; e leyssa la extramitat del ciphac que es en aquest latz, e fay penetrar la agulha en l’autra extremitat de la partida dedintz a la partida deforo.	Direction A follows from the starting point to where you must stop, then turn left and walk along the path until reaching its extreme end on the right side of your departure entrance; now insert the pin through the other extremity of the exit door and towards the entry entrance.

In the field of mathematics, particularly in topology and geometry, there exists a concept called "fibration," which can be loosely interpreted as a way to describe how one space (called the 'total space') is built up or constructed using another space ('the base space'), with fibers being additional spaces attached at each point of the base space.
E aprop comensa de aquest meteys costat e cus aquel am la extremitat que es del ciphac en l’autra latz, e extratz la agulha de la codena la qual penetrec, e aprop redutz aquela en aquela codena e cos la extremitat del ciphac que es en l’autra costat am aquesta extramitat del mirat; e extratz aquela de la codena la qual es de part de lu. E fay aquo una veguada e autra, e fay aquo una veguada aprop autre veguada entro que tu cozes tot aquo que es deforo segon aquel eysemple.	Two water sources and another, each providing one source of water per household according to the given example.
E la suma de aquesta manieyra de sutura es que tu cozes am sutura de pellicies am la qual cozo las pels, enayssi que tu cozes le ciphac una veguada de la part de la extremitat de la codena, e que leysses aquela autra veguada entro que la ajas complida.	The sum of this suture pattern is to use a fish-skin suture that you cut with scissors; thus, you sew one stitch near the end part of the limb and then pull the other stitch through so it completes the closure.
Mays la segonda specia de sutura propria la qual dieys eyssament Gualia , e aquest es de sermo de lu e per lu recomtat, es que tu cozas aquela segon semilitut am la qual alcus medicantz cozo aquela, enayssi que agreguan tota partida a la sua compar partida a lu convenient per natura; e aplican la extremitat de autre de lu e la extremitat del mirat al autra extremitat de lu, e aquo es fayt segon que yeu a tu recomti.	The second proper suture technique you should learn is the Galea method, which I will explain in detail and then summarize again for better understanding; this involves stitching that segment of tissue where medications have been applied, enseing that all parts are adequately connected to their respective counterparts by nature; they place one end of a thread on each side, and the suture is performed as follows:
Cove que tu fiques la agulha en la extremitat del mirat a tu propdana de la partida deforo, e fassas aquela penetrar a la partida dedintz en aquel sol, e leysses dos extremitatz del ciphac; e aprop revolveys la agulha e fay aquela penetrar de foro a la dedintz en dos extremitatz del ciphac.	You place the needle on the edge of your sight, near your starting point from the porch, and let it enter into the distance in that direction at noon. Then you see two extremities of the circle; then you revolve the needle so that it enters into the distance in two different directions of the circle.

Forma de serra:	Serrated shape or form of sawtooth. In English, this term is often referred to as "serrated" or having a "saw-toothed" pattern. It describes an edge or outline that has multiple points and indentations similar to the teeth of a saw. This type of structure can be found in various contextangs such as mountains (a serrated mountain range), leaves, knives, and other objects with a jagged appearance.
Forma de autra serra:	Alternative title or form of the mountain range: Another name for a well-known mountain range. For example, if referring to the Rockies in North America, you could also call them the "Rocky Mountains." Other notable ranges include the Andes (South American Cordillera), Alps (Eurasian Alpine Range), and Himalayas (Himachal or Greater Kailash).
Forma de autra serra:	Other way of saying "another mountain range": alternative term for a series of mountains.

Forma de ray:	Shape of a ray: A ray in geometry is a straight line that starts at a particular point and extends infinitely in one direction. It's often represented with two points, where the first point indicates the starting point (also known as its endpoint) and an arrow on the second point to show that it continues endlessly in that direction.
Sia le cap de aquest ray segon la forma de cap de clau stellat, e les puntz de lu sian segon la forma dels puntz alstefegi.	The head of this ray follows the shape of a star-shaped nail head, and its points are arranged according to the arrangement of stars in a constellation.
E no conveneys sino que am aquel sian confricadatz les caps de las juncturas quan so corrumpudas, o es la boca gran ampla.	In the anatomy of a tree trunk, two types of growth rings are distinguished - annual and false or pseudo-annual rings. Annual rings represent one year of growth and can be identified by their alternating light (spring) wood with large pores for efficient water transportation, and darker (summer/fall) wood containing smaller pore structures for structural support.
Forma de razori major dels autres:	In English, the equivalent term for "Forma de razori mayor" (which is Catalan) would be "Major premise." A syllogism consists of three parts: a major premise, a minor premise, and a conclusion. The major premise is a general statement or principle that applies to all members of the category being discussed in the argument.
Forma de razori menor:	Menor forma del rasero (Shorter surface area): En este contexto, se refiere a la reducción o disminución en el área superficial de un objeto. Esto podría ser relevante en varias aplicaciones científfas y tecnológicas donde las propiedades relacionadas con el tamaño del área son significativas para el rendimiento, diseño u otras características del material.

Este diseño permite recoger eficazcuente los alimentos sólidos o líquidos y llevarlos fácilmente a la boca.

Then if you wish to heal and extract it, nothing can be done unless you must the whole ambulation appears from there at once, therefore you should grasp what is upon it and what is left behind its limbs and constrictions, and press dryly upon it until extracted.
E si es preondat en la carn e no le atrobes, lahoras tu pausa cauteri am foc sobre le loc entro que mora, e la major causa que es temuda es corrupcio de lu am la qual corrump le loc ayssi cum havem dit.	E is unclean in his flesh and he does not put on righteeousness, therefore his prayer chamber shall be made a bald place out of that place wherein he abides, and the greatest cause which is feared is corruption thereof; so they destroy the place as we have said.
May si tu vezes aquel esser pervengut al cap prop del huel, lahoras strenh sobre le sobrecil am fort strictura, e aprop secsa sobre lu, e extratz aquel; e cove que·l malaute use de mondificacio del sieu cors am medicinas evacuantz humors putridas malas, e guarda se de viandas generantz putrefaccio.	If ever you should reach the end of this booklet in good health, spend time stretching and exercising your body regularly, and take care to avoid it; also ensure that any illness takes medicines designed to evacuate bad humors from the body, and be careful not to consume foods that promote decay.
De sectione super aegritudinem nafir.	From the section regarding relief from pain.
Aquesta malautia es nompnada en nostra terra nafir, e es dolor la qual ve en alcus membres, e aprop es permudada de membre en membre.	This disease is called in our native land firefly fever, and it causes pain that flits from limb to limb. It also involves changes of body parts.
E yeu ja e vista aquela segon que yeu te recomtare.	Once upon a time, there was a person who followed your recommendations just as you suggested. This individual found great success and happiness in their endeavors, thanks to the wisdom and guidance provided by yours truly! It goes to show that sometimes all we need is some helpful advice to set us on the right path towards our goals.
Yeu fu apelat a una femna malauta ad una vila, e descubric le sieu bras e vi una imflacio petita en la vena funis del bras, e pus que fu romas per una hora, vi aquela imflacio anar ayssi cum va verm pujan ad aquest, mays pus leugierament que esser por, ayssi cum si fos argent viu quan corr de loc en loc.	A woman in a village fell ill and I visited her at home; upon examining her arm, I noticed a small swelling on the median vein of the arm, so I gently massaged it for an hour until that swelling went away as if by magic, moving even faster than silver flowing from place to place.
E adonc anet s’en la dolor de aquel loc e fiquet se en le muscle, e aprop aqui stec per una hora.	Well then, because of that pain in that place and I felt it in the muscle, I stayed here for about an hour.
E aprop correc en l’autre cors entro que pervenc al autre bras.	A prop, the correct way is to turn towards the opposite corner once you reach the other arm.
E aprop recomtec a mi que revolvia se per tot le cors sieu segon que yeu vi; e fo trop meravelat de la permutacio de lu e de la velocitat de membre en membre. E yeu ja havia vist denant aquo en les mieus huels segon aquela manieyra, empero yeu he vistz motz les quals atroban dolor esser permutada de membra a membre.	I saw there in the old texts according to that pattern, however, I have seen many instances where severe pain is described as being transferred from one limb to another.
Mays no vi aquo am les huels ayssi cum en la femna.	May's grandfather is not alive as much as the woman.
E yeu no cogiti esser aquo sino que es per aquo quar la femna era de viela, on so de secs cors e de venas descubertas, e en aquesta apparec al sentiment aquela ventositat permutada.	You seem to be water rather than a liquid as the woman was from a village, with bare arms and exposed veins, and this appearance evoked in me a sense of changing winds.
E es necessari que no apparesca segon aquesta retro-curacio en aquels que son delicioses e am cors humitz de venas ameguadas.	It is necessary that you do not appear in this backward cure for those who are diabetic and prone to vein thrombosis.

De extraccio de sagetas.	Extracting the juice from berries.
Sagetas son diversificadas segon las specias, e segon les locs dels cors en les quals cazo, quar la lor diversitat es que de aquellas so que han grans puntas, e petitas, e concavas, e sordas, so es solidas; e de lor so que han tres angles, e de aquelas a las quals so que han lenguas; e de aquelas a las quals so astelas.	The characteristics of Sagetas are varied according to the species and the locations where they occur, as their diversity depends on those that have large spikes, small ones, concave or dull heads, which are solid; and from those that have three angles, and from those whose heads feature tongues.
E aquela que es segon les membres e las pessas en las quals cazo es segon dos manieyras: quar les membres o so membres principals concaus, ayssi cum le cervel, le cor, e·l fitge, e le pulmo, e les ronhos, e les budels, e la vezica, e a lor semblantz; e donc quan catz en alcu de aquestz membres e aparo a tu senhals de mort, la qual causa yeu recomtare aprop, lahoras cove que tu evites extraccio de aquela sageta en aquels quar la mort siec aquel en le qual en las majors disposicios, e quan a tu no appareysso aquestz mals senhals, e la sageta no es amaguada en la profunditat del membre, lahoras tu extratz aquela e cura la plagua.	From that which concerns the members and limbs in which cases follow two manners: whether it be of main members or of their organs - thus as the brain, heart, liver, lungs, nerves, intestines, veins, and their appearance; hence when certain diseases appear to you in one of these members, I advise now that you avoid excessive use of those parts where death strikeby its most common causes. In conditions such as when the symptoms do not show in you or when there is no sign of affliction in the depths of the member, then treat and cure the ailment accordingly.
E dels senhals del servel es quan catz en lu sageta, e trespassa le os, e es yssit del cyphac le qual es sobre le cervel, quar accideys per lu soda vehement, e scotomia, e vertige, e rogor en les huels, e imflamacio e rogor de la lengua, e spasme e permixtio de entendament e vomi de colera, e fort leu es abscindida la paraula e es destruida la votz, e es yssit del loc de la plagua humiditat blanca semblant a pols, e yeys de lu semblant ad aquositat de la carn. E donc si appareyso a tu aquestz senhals, lahoras tu abste de la curacio e de la extraccio de la sageta, si non es fora.	Then if you wish to learn this sign language, try to avoid curing and extracting the sack unless necessary.
Mays les senhals de la sageta quan catz en le cor, so que ela es prop de la mamila senestra, e sent am aquela quays sia ficada en causa dura, e no es causa vueda; e fort leu le movement de la sageta es semblant a movement del pols, e corr de la plagua sanc negra, e siec aquel fregiditat de las extremitatz, e suzor freja, e sincopi; e donc sapias que la mort descen ses tot dopte.	Mays's signs of the stingray when touched in the chest are as if it were close to the left nipple, and she feels that there is no pain; however, the movement of the stingray is similar to a wrist twist, and redness spreads like black blood streaks, along with coldness at the extremities, excessive sweating, and syncope. The signs when the chest has swolculed blood foam from the pleura, and the vessels whose property is of the heart are congested, and the color of illness changes, and he breathes with great effort, and seeks a large intake of air.

The pain is located in the upper abdardomen near the navel area and radiates towards the small ribs; it occurs sporadically throughout the day, intensifying with movement, and sometimes affects all limb muscles.
E si catz la sageta en le stomac, lahoras fort leu yeys de la plagua vianda alcuna indigesta.	If a cat swallows the hook in its stomach, it may vomit up some undigested food from the sea.
E si catz la sageta en le ventre, e es ficada en lu, yeys alcuna fenda de la plagua, o la tela, o budel le qual es disromput, e no es speransa en la curacio de lu extraccio de la sageta. If the bladder stone obstructs the neck of the bladamoen, and causes urine to flow out abnormally, and if there are no other reasons for such symptoms, and severe pain is associated with this illness; then be aware that it can be fatal.
Mays les autres membres ayssi cum es la cara, le col, e·l golayro, e las spallas e le adjutori, e les spondils del dos, e la furcula, e la coysa, e la camba e a lor semblantz dels membres, son salvatz segon las majors disposicios quan la sageta no atroba vena ni arteria e no es sageta venenosa. E yeu recomtare aquo a tu que he vist del esser de aquestas sagetas, per que signifiques per aquo sobre la curacio tieua.	I would highly recommend exploring the beauty of these landscapes to you who have experienced their existence because they offer not only an escape from the stress and worries of everyday life but also a sense of peace, calmness, and rejuvenation that can help improve your mental health.

E extrayssi una autra sageta a un home Crestia la qual era cazuta en le golayro, e era sageta arabica, e es aquela a la qual so aurelhas; e adonc yeu inscidegui sobre aquela entre doas guidegi, e ja era submersa en le golayro de lu; e adonc yeu so subtiliat am aquela, e aprop extraxi aquela, e es sanat le Crestia . E le artifexs savi compara am pauc sobre mot; e am aquo que es present sobre aquo que es absent; e atroba operacio novela e instrument novel deves le descendement de las causas extranhas del art quan accideysso. E donc yeu dic que sagetas no son fora-gitadas dels membres en les quals son ficadas sino segon dos manieyras: o per atraccio del loc en le qual intrec; o per le contrari de la autra partida.	Hence, it is said that statues are not placed outside by the members who create them, but rather according to two ways: either due to the location in which they are inserted or contrary to the other party'es choice.
E aquela que es gitada per le loc don es intrada, o es sageta procedent en loc carnos, e es atirada e fora-gitada.	In the place where a cat has entered through the door, it is chased by someone and thrown out.
E si no obezeys a eyssiment de la hora en la qual catz, lahoras cove que tu la laysses per alcus dias entro que poyresca la carn que es al enviro de lu, e sia alleujada l‘atraccio de lu e la sua egressio. E semblantment si es ficada en os e no obezeys a tu a eyssiment, lahoras layssa aquela per alcus dias e itera aquela am atraccio e mocio en quascun dia, e ja es fora-gitada.	If you fail to comply with this settlement and do not adhere to the terms set forth herein, then your case may be dismissed after thirty days from today's date, without further notice or action on our part.
E si no obezeys a tu eyssiment aprop alcus dias, lahoras cove que tu perforas en le circuit de la sageta en aquel os de tota partida am taravel subtil entro que·l loc sia amplificat de la sageta, e aprop extratz aquela. E si la sageta es ficada en le os del cap e ja ha procezit en un dels ventres del cervel, e apparo en le malaute alcus de aquels accidentz les quals yeu e ditz, lahoras abste de la extraccio de la sageta e layssa aquela entro que·l sieu esser sia equat aprop alcus dias; quar si la sageta perve al ciphac, lahoras la mort no es a lu prolonguada. E si no podes sobre lu per la constriccio de la plagua e per la longitut del preon, e aqui no es os ni nervi ni vena, lahoras tu fen sobre la plagua entro que sia amplificada e que sia possible extrayre la sageta. E si so a lu aurelhas am las quals sia tenguda, lahoras tu deliura la carn en la qual es ficada de tota partida am tot le engen que poyras far; e ingenia sobre aquo, si no podes sobre la evasio de la carn en la fractura de las aurelhas e en torssio de aquelas entro que obezesca.	The Lord said to the serpent: "I give you authority over every animal on land and in water, all the birds in the air; yet with them I do not put an end to man, so that they may be a snare for him." (Genesis 3:1-5)
E quan tu administras la extraccio de la sageta en quascun loc on sia, lahoras tu usa am torcio de la tua ma am forceps a totas partidas entro que fassa aquela obezir; e subtilia am deriera subtilitat que la sageta no sia trencada e que sia fayta a tu dificil atraccio de lu e de aquela extraccio. Mays si a tu fa contrarietat flux de sanc, lahoras tu administra aquo que havem dit de curacio en le sieu capitol.	It seems you're upset by this amount of blood loss; please manage the fluid intake that we have recommended for healing in your capital (head).
E guarda la tua vertut de inscizio de vena o de nervi, o de corda, e aministra engen en tota manieyra a tu possibla de la evasio de la sageta; e fay aquo am facilitat e tranquillitat e tarditat e fermetat ayssi cum yeu e a tu recomtat.	Watch your restlessness or nervousness, or tension in the cords, and offer yourself as much support whenever possible during relaxation exerciscu; it should bring you ease, tranquility, slowness, and steadiness just like I do for myself.
E donc que fassas contrayre la sageta per so que·l malaute sia segon la figura segon la qual foc deves le cazement de la sageta en lu, quar es mays juvatiu.	So that I make a counterargument against the proposal because the malady follows the figure according to which you must undertake the construction of the sailboat at sea, as it is more convenient.
Mays si aquo no es a tu possible, lahoras tu aministra aquo que es a tu possible per las figuras.	"Maya's suggestion does not align with your possibilities; however, let'amo consider the alternatives that are within your range of options."
Mays las sagetas que son fora-gitadas per le contrari del autra partida, o que ja de lu procezeys alcuna partida a las partidas de fora, o fa gilbositat la extramitat de la sageta per sentiment de la partida pus desus de la codena propdana e vezes aquela eminent; adonc tu secsa sobre aquela; e sia la seccio segon la quantitat en la qual prenguan las forceps; e aprop atira aquela, quar ela es fayta leugiera a eyssiment. Forma de forceps am las quals so atiradas las sagetas:	En inglés, esta expresión podría traducirse como "de la misma manera que se utilizan los pinzas". Aquí el sentido es metapcuhical y hace referencia a algo similar o análogo. Los "forceps" son un instrumento quirúrgico diseñado para agarrar, manipular u extraer objetos del cuerpo durante una operación médica, mientras que las "sagitas", en este contexto parece ser una palabra inventada, podría referirse a pequeños elementos o aspectos.

This iconic structure, located at First Street Northeast between North and South Capitol Streets, houses both chambers of Congress - the Senate and the House of Representatives. The current U.S. Capitol was completed in 1863, replacing an earlier building that had been destroyed by a fire in 1814 during the War of 1812.

Capitol .iiii.	The Capital of the United States is Washington, D.C., which stands for District of Columbia (D.C.). This federal district was established by the Constitution as a separate entity not part of any state to serve as the nation's capital and seat of government. It is located on land donated by the states of Maryland and Virginia and is bordered by these two states, with the Potomac River lying along its western edge. Washington, D.C., was officially established in 1790 following the Residence Act passed by Congress, which designated it as the permanent capital to replace temporary capitals such as Philadelphia and New York City used earlier during the early years of American independence.

De sermo en dislocacio.	Topic: Movement Disorders and Conversation
Dislocacio es eyssiment de alcuna de las juncturas del sieu loc, per que es prohibida de movement, e es orrezada la figura del membre, e fa venir sobre le malaute dolors e lesios grans.	A dislocation is a displacement of one of the joints in the body, making it unable to move and causing severe pain and injuries. The affected limb's position appears abnormal.
Donc quan accideys ad alcu dislocacio, lahoras cove tantost perforsar que sia reduzit, e no tarde aquela reduzir, quar si es tardada, le loc es apostemat e fort leu am aquo es fayta dificil la reduccio de dislocaccio. Capitol .xxiiii.	Chapter XXIV. (In Roman numerals, "Capitol" followed by "XXIV" represents the number 24)
De curacio de dislocacio de la mandibula dejos.	Treatment of Mandibular Dislocation Lateral Displacement
So dislocadas las doas mandibulas si no tart; e la dislocacio de amdos es fayta segon una de dos manieyras: que o son remaugudas de lurs locs per pauca remocio, e so mollificadas un petit; o so dislocadas per entiera dislocacio e complida, entro que sian mollificadas a la partida de la junctura entro que corro saliva del malaute e que no puesca tenir aquela ni puesca claure la sua boca, e la lengua de lu sia envolopada en sa paraula.	If the lower jaws are displanked at birth and there is dislocation of both, it occurs in one of two ways: either they are slightly stretched from their original position and mildly relaxed, or completely dislocated with full separation, between which saliva flows due to pain and prevents them from closing their mouths; the tongue is wrapped around its own palate.
Mays quan la dislocacio de lu es pauca, lahoras en las majors disposicios retorna per si an pauca causa.	The occurrence of May's mild dislocation is rare, the hours after major surgery often return to normal without much cause.
Mays si la dislocacio es entiera e complida, lahoras cove que sia administrada reduccio de lu leugierament, e no sia tardada de tot.	If Mays' displacement is complete and entire, he shall be given sufficient time to respond thoughtfully, without being rushed at all.
E es que·l ministre tengua le cap del malaute, e entrometa lo metge le dit pous de la una sieua ma en la razit de la dislocacio de la mandibula dedintz la boca de lu, si la dislocacio es de la una part; o que entrometa les sieus dos pouzes ensemps, si la dislocacio es de doas partz, e les autres ditz de las mas de lu sian defora am les quals enguale; e comanda al malaute que cesse las suas mandibulas e absolva aquelas anar de quascuna partida; e le metge engualhe la mandibula e enpellisca la mandibula entro que retorne al sieu loc.	The Minister should have knowledge of the pain, and insert the aforementioned finger on one side in relation to the dislocation of the jaw inside his mouth; if the dislocation is on one side, or insert both thumbs together if the dislocation is on both sides, while all other fingers similarly. He then commands the patient to stop their jaws and absolve them from any displaced position; and the physician aligns the jaw and pushes it until it returns to its original place.
E si dificil es la reducio de lu, e majorment si amdos las mandibulas so essemps dislocadas, lahoras aministra evoporacio am aygua cauda e oli, entro que sia fayta leugiera la reduccio de amdos e no tardes la reduccio de amdos de tot, ayssi quo havem dit.	It is difficult to reduce the swelling, especially if both mandibles are dislocated. Firstly administer antipyretic and anti-inflammatory medication as well as plenty of water; then it should be easy to perform bilateral reduction, without delaying the procedure, as we have mentioned.
E donc cum retornam e so engualadas, e es clausa la boca del malaute e no es mollificada, lahoras pausa sobre aquelas polvils de drap am cerot, e sia fayt de cera e oli rozat; e aprop sia liat am facilitat am liamens mols.	And so they returned home, both equally affected, with the mouth of sorrow closed and unappeased. Hours passed over those dusty rags of red silk, now waxed and scented with oil; and it was made soft to be easily heard by many ears.
E sia le dormir del malaute sobre le sieu dos, e·l cap de lu sia stant entre dos aurelhes, per so que no maugue aquel a la partida dreyta ni a la sinistra; e no li fassas per forsa masteguar alcuna causa; habans la sieua vianda sia forbicio leon, entro que quan las dolors sian remaugudas e las mandibulas so nozadas, lahoras maugue aquo que vol.	E should sleep of the sickness upon his head, and his hair be parted between two ears, for he may not have that on either side; nor let any cause force him to turn it. His food shall be lion's fur, within which when pains are renewed and jaws become numb, therein should he sleep until the time is right.
E aquo sia aministrat am facilita, e no trebalhe sobre la apercio de la boca deves la comestio e beure e ocitatio, entro que la mandibula sia nozada e sanada.	Water can be taken easily, and you should not open your mouth for eating or drinking or sneezing until the jaw is numb and healed.
E si es dificil la reduccio de duas mandibulas quan so dislocadas en alcuna hora e no so convertidas als lors locs, lahoras motas veguadas accideysso febres e soda assidua, e fort leu es alerguat le ventre del malaute, e fort leu e vomeys colera pura.	It is difficult to reduce the two dislocated jaws at any time and not return them to their original positions; then there are recurraturess of fevers and persistent sores, and often the abdomen swells with pain due to the illness, and vomiting occurs as in pure cholera.
E quan tu vezes aquo, lahoras sapias que es perdicio; e motas veguadas mor aquel al qual accideys aquo en x dias.	Twice the square root of time in hours since it was crafted multiplied by the number of times water has passed through, and then add a hundred for each day that has elapsed since its creation to the waterwheel'cups capacity.

De reduccio de la dislocacio de la furcula e de la extremitat del muscle.	The reduction of the fracture in the furcula and distal end of the muscle.
Furcula no es dislocada del latz dedintz per la sua continuacio am le pietz; e alcunas veguadas es dislocada a la partida defora, e aquo es declarat al sentiment.	The furcula is not displaced from the left ribs due to its continuous attachment at the sternal end; however, in some cases it can be dislocated at the beginning and then repositioned externally, as reported by experts.
E la restauracio de lu es que·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu dos e extenda les sieus brasses.	The remedy of lavender is that the bad ailment covers her forehead and extends its branches.
E aprop coarta le loc am la tua palma am fort coartacio, quar ela retornara.	The arrow bends to the left at its tip as it flies through the air. As it returns, the curve becomes more pronounced.
E aprop pausa sobre aquela emplastre e pulvils e strenh aquela.	A) Take the plaster and powders, and strengthen that one.
